<title level="1" right="Trait">[Elixir](/Traits.aspx?ID=59)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 631 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Elixirs are [alchemical](/Traits.aspx?ID=6) liquids that are used by drinking them.
name: Elixir
